title: Zameen.com Property Scraper
description: Scrape property listings from Zameen.com canonical listing pages (recommended). If you donâ€™t have a listing URL, provide `location + keyword` and the actor will resolve a canonical listing URL (avoids /search which often returns 503).

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Array of Zameen.com LISTING URLs (recommended). Use canonical listing pages like https://www.zameen.com/Homes/Lahore-1-1.html or https://www.zameen.com/Homes/Lahore_Bahria_Town-509-1.html (avoid /search which often returns 503).

category.title: Category
category.description: Which Zameen category to resolve when using keyword+location (ignored when using startUrls).

keyword.title: Keyword
keyword.description: Area/development keyword to resolve within the city (e.g., 'Bahria Town', 'DHA', 'G-13').

location.title: Location
location.description: City name (e.g., 'Lahore', 'Islamabad', 'Karachi'). Used together with keyword to build a canonical listing URL.

results_wanted.title: Maximum listings
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of listings to collect across all pages.

max_pages.title: Pagination limit
max_pages.description: Safety cap on how many listing pages to open per start URL.

scrapeDetails.title: Open detail pages
scrapeDetails.description: If enabled, actor opens each listing detail page for full data (recommended).

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy to reduce blocking. Data center works; residential is optional for heavy runs.
